Key:
(I was captured by a strange feeling. A space
like one would see in movies or manga, with
no feeling of up from down. A digital world.)

(I had been thrown out there. I couldn't recall
what I had been doing before. I was merely,
suddenly floating.)
There is something that I must know.

(I can't tell for sure, but that girl looks
familiar. I know her. And I know what she's
about to ask, and what she wishes for...)

Shido Itsuka. With you, I will be able to find
the answer. It is because I believe this, that I
will ask you this question.
I hope this will be the last time.

I see. Then, I must continue onward.
Observing love...
